entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
